name: SafeDating (3D Game)
author: Manan Sethi
description: Created a safe, kid-friendly 3D open-world dating game at DPL Studios, where players explore diverse locations and engage in conversations with characters, utilizing Unity and Blender across three levels.

name: Mi’kmaw Kina’matnewey (2D Game)
author: Manan Sethi
description: A 2D adventure game integrating Mi'kmaw language learning, currently in development with planned fixes, new features, and iPad compatibility.

name: Weather App
author: Manan Sethi
description: A simple weather app fetching data from OpenWeather API.
